usrn.title: USRN
usrn.description: Unique Street Reference Number. Source: Contributing Local Authority

state.title: Street State
state.description: A code indentifying the current state of the street, eg 'open'

description.title: Street Name or Description
description.description: Name taken from the Local Land and Property Gazetteer (LLPG) street name

locality.title: Locality
locality.description: Locality areas define an area within a post town. These are only necessary for postal purposes and are used to aid differentiation where there are thoroughfares of the same name in the same locality. For example, HIGH STREET in SHIRLEY and SWAYTHLING in this situation: HIGH STREET, SHIRLEY, SOUTHAMPTON and HIGH STREET, SWAYTHLING, SOUTHAMPTON. Source: Royal Mail

townName.title: Town name
townName.description: The name of the town the address is within. Source: Contributing Local Authority

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: The alias for the street in question.

administrativeArea.title: Administrative area
administrativeArea.description: Local Highway Authority Name. Source: Contributing Local Authority

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: Code to indicate the surface finish of the street

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: Code for the primary street classification, eg denoting it to be 'open to all vehicles'

startX.title: Start X
startX.description: A value in metres defining the eastings location of the start of the street in accordance to the British National Grid. Source: Ordnance Survey

startY.title: Start Y
startY.description: A value in metres defining the northings location of the start of the street in accordance to the British National Grid. Source: Ordnance Survey

endX.title: End X
endX.description: A value in metres defining the eastings location of the start of the street in accordance to the British National Grid. Source: Ordnance Survey

endY.title: End Y
endY.description: A value in metres defining the northings location of the start of the street in accordance to the British National Grid. Source: Ordnance Survey

startLongitude.title: Start Longitude
startLongitude.description: A value defining the Longitude location of the start of the street in accordance with the ETRS89 coordinate reference system. Source: Ordnance Survey

startLatitude.title: Start Latitude
startLatitude.description: A value defining the Latitude in accordance of the start of the street with the ETRS89 coordinate reference system. Source: Ordnance Survey

endLongitude.title: End Longitude
endLongitude.description: A value defining the Longitude location of the start of the street in accordance with the ETRS89 coordinate reference system. Source: Ordnance Survey

endLatitude.title: End Latitude
endLatitude.description: A value defining the Latitude in accordance of the start of the street with the ETRS89 coordinate reference system. Source: Ordnance Survey

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.description: Where this data has come from - Ordnance Survey, legacy, etc
